data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hausdorf, Bernhard, Bössneck, Ulrich (2016): Helicopsis persica n. sp. from northern Iran (Gastropoda: Geomitridae). Zootaxa 4066 (2): 194-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.2.9
